reviews.review: "I Feel Pretty" was more entertaining. There was too much expectation to have seen all of the previous individual character's films and Black Panther continues to be the lamest Marvel character to date.

First half: 6/10
More jokes and more jokes, and some heartbreaking deaths. The movie is clearly going for a tragedy route, but that takes a backseat for the characters interactions and colourful locations.
Second half: 9/10
Now that is tragedy. And the cultivation of the MCU universe so far. Nuff said.

Final verdict: 8.5/10
Marvel... you have delivered an amazing well thought out villain in Thanos! He stole the show and as he should have! You juggled a plethora of Avengers and did it well! Serious hats off to you guys!

See it . . . Is it the best movie in the world.  No.  Is it a really good movie that does a amazing job balancing a large cast holding down multiple story lines . . . Yes it does.  You will not see anything else like this and if you have invested in this universe the last 10 years it is a very satisfying beginning of the change of guard.
wow omg que esperan para ir a verla vayan de una buena vez !!!!!!

like a runaway train from start to finish. Then there's that ending!! It's like that same train slams your brain against the wall leaving you in stunned silence. exhilarating, heart crushing, funny and deep. And really impatient for A4

En mi opinión, una de las mejores películas de Marvel...hacía años que no escuchaba tantas reacciones tan emocionadas de la gente durante una proyección. Y era muy chistoso darte cuenta que de repente, aunque no quisieras, tú también estabas haciendo alguna exclamación de felicidad o sorpresa junto con toda la gente. 
Lo peor es que no había terminado la película y ya quería verla de nuevo...y creo que seguramente lo haré dos o tres veces más. Maldito Marvel!! ?????
Surprising, shocking even...go see it...left me sitting in the theater stunned
Gripping, entertaining, devastating. Such a great film. Can't wait to see it again.

Tightly plot, expertly edited, brilliantly pace. A masterpiece 10 years in the making that deftly weaves a decade of storytelling into an emotionally satisfying and action-packed masterpiece. More than once, I forgot to breathe. The Russos didn't let us down!
